info.description: Rest API of product zilla academy
info.title: ProductZilla Academy Core service.

get.description: Fetch career job level by career name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Status:
 * `0` - Waiting status
 * `1` - Published on LMS portal
 * `2` - Returned to creator
 * `3` - Deactivated / Hidden on LMS Portal

get.description: Fetch all course by career career

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Status:
 * `0` - Waiting status
 * `1` - Published on LMS portal
 * `2` - Returned to creator
 * `3` - Deactivated / Hidden on LMS Portal
